QuestData.Title: The Fall of Jintha'Alor
QuestData.Description: We've got more to deal with than just dwarves, mon. While I watch the village, my mate Primal Torntusk has gone to lead our warriors against the wicked Vilebranch tribe.$B$BThey've killed our brothers, and I was even taken prisoner by them once. No more! This time, the city of Jintha'Alor falls to us.$B$BGo to Jintha'Alor and speak with my mate. She's captured a camp near the entrance to the city.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Primal Torntusk at Jintha'Alor in The Hinterlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $c. We're gonna make the Vilebranch regret ever crossin' us.
